SimPlugins/src/PluginMessenger.cxx
00001 #include "SimPlugins/PluginMessenger.h"
00002 
00003 namespace ldmx {
00004 
00005     PluginMessenger::PluginMessenger(PluginManager* thePluginManager) :
00006             pluginManager_(thePluginManager) {
00007 
00008         pluginDir_ = new G4UIdirectory("/ldmx/plugins/");
00009         pluginDir_->SetGuidance("Commands for controlling LDMX sim plugins");
00010 
00011         loadCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/plugins/load", this);
00012         loadCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit, G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00013         loadCmd_->SetGuidance("Load a sim plugin from a shared library.  A plugin of a specific type may only be loaded once.");
00014         G4UIparameter* pluginName = new G4UIparameter("pluginName", 's', false);
00015         pluginName->SetGuidance("Name of plugin to load.");
00016         loadCmd_->SetParameter(pluginName);
00017         G4UIparameter* libName = new G4UIparameter("libName", 's', true);
00018         libName->SetGuidance("Name of plugin library; if omitted will use the 'libSimPlugins.so' library.");
00019         loadCmd_->SetParameter(libName);
00020 
00021         destroyCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/plugins/destroy", this);
00022         destroyCmd_->SetGuidance("Destroy a loaded plugin by name.");
00023         destroyCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00024         pluginName = new G4UIparameter("pluginName", 's', false);
00025         pluginName->SetGuidance("Name of plugin to destroy.");
00026         destroyCmd_->SetParameter(pluginName);
00027 
00028         listCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/plugins/list", this);
00029         listCmd_->SetGuidance("List currently loaded plugins.");
00030         listCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle, G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit);
00031     }
00032 
00033     PluginMessenger::~PluginMessenger() {
00034         delete pluginDir_;
00035         delete loadCmd_;
00036         delete destroyCmd_;
00037         delete listCmd_;
00038     }
00039 
00040     void PluginMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand* command, G4String newValues) {
00041 
00042         std::istringstream is((const char*) newValues);
00043         std::string pluginName, libName;
00044 
00045         is >> pluginName >> libName;
00046 
00047         if (libName.size() == 0 || libName == "") {
00048             libName = "libSimPlugins.so";
00049         }
00050 
00051         if (command == loadCmd_) {
00052             pluginManager_->create(pluginName, libName);
00053         } else if (command == destroyCmd_) {
00054             pluginManager_->destroy(pluginName);
00055         } else if (command == listCmd_) {
00056             pluginManager_->print(std::cout);
00057         }
00058     }
00059 
00060 }
